azurerm_iothub_dps_shared_access_policy.description: Manages an IotHub Device Provisioning Service Shared Access Policy

name.description: Specifies the name of the IotHub Shared Access Policy resource. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group under which the IotHub Shared Access Policy resource has to be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

iothub_dps_name.description: The name of the IoT Hub Device Provisioning service to which this Shared Access Policy belongs. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

enrollment_read.description: Adds `EnrollmentRead` permission to this Shared Access Account. It allows read access to enrollment data.
